message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose all the details publicly, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,200,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000, a price that allows for both of us to benefit from this deal. This offer is only valid for a limited time, so please let me know your decision as soon as possible.
